glsa.title: ZNC: Privilege escalation
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in ZNC allows for privilege escalation.

background.p: ZNC is an advanced IRC bouncer.

description.p: cnu discovered multiple CRLF injection vulnerabilities in ZNC's webadmin module.

impact.p: A remote authenticated attacker could modify the znc.conf configuration file and gain privileges via newline characters in e.g. the QuitMessage field, and possibly execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All ZNC users should upgrade to the latest version:
